title: Weekly Digest (19 April, 2019 - 26 April, 2019)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 42 issues were created.
Of these, 20 issues have been closed and 22 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #8044 [Redirect to Chats main view happens after QR code scan on 'Add bootnode' or 'Add mailserver' screen  ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8044), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #8043 [Feature Request: obtain ens username via the Status DApp API](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8043), by [richard-ramos](https://github.com/richard-ramos)
:green_heart: #8042 [Fixed broken EIP15777 support](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8042), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:green_heart: #8039 [workaround issue with building iOS release builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8039), by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:green_heart: #8038 [Make pr build debuggable](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8038), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #8036 [Tribute to Talk adr](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8036), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8035 [Refactor/move block contact](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8035), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8033 [Allow to fetch more history in public chats (up to 30 days)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8033), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8032 [[Onboarding] Update sign-in flow](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8032), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8029 [feature #4959 - eip-55 in wallet send and request](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8029), by [goranjovic](https://github.com/goranjovic)
:green_heart: #8028 [[Wallet] Epic](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8028), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #8027 [[Wallet] Show values in the user's currency](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8027), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #8026 [[Wallet] Sign transaction module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8026), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #8022 [Feature fix/ttt settings](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8022), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8018 [Update status-go to v0.24.0-beta.1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8018), by [dshulyak](https://github.com/dshulyak)
:green_heart: #8016 [Crash when open browser tab](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8016), by [asemiankevich](https://github.com/asemiankevich)
:green_heart: #8015 [can't connect to mailserver](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8015), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #8014 [[Fixed #7948] Do not navigate back to chat when in a DApp](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8014), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:green_heart: #8013 [Feature Request: Touch Bar Integration](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8013), by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
:green_heart: #8012 [Gaps on desktop](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8012), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8009 [[7947] Feature: Blank out app preview screen when switching apps on m…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8009), by [bitsikka](https://github.com/bitsikka)
:green_heart: #8004 [[Fixes #7325] Add EIP681 deeplink support](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8004), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #8041 [upgrade urllib3: 1.24 > 1.24.2](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8041), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #8040 [upgrade fastlane: 2.117.1 > 2.121.1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8040), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #8037 [Fix broken contact syncing](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8037), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:heart: #8034 [updating dev dependencies](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8034), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8031 [add diawi upload retries](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8031), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #8030 [Contacts that added after initial sync on 0.12.0 are shown in contact list on release 0.11.0, but in fact are not added as contacts](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8030), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #8025 [Maintain scroll position after fetching gap](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8025), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #8024 [fix token transactions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8024), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8023 [[Fixes #7760] Allow copy/paste in browser URL bar](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8023), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:heart: #8021 [[fix] wallet on-error dispatch](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8021), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8020 [[Fixes #8001] Fixes white flash on Android](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8020), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:heart: #8019 [react switch warnings fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8019), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #8017 [[#8008] Error "No protocol method IDeref.-deref defined for type unde…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8017), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #8011 [Error 503 when accessing dapps](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8011), by [asemiankevich](https://github.com/asemiankevich)
:heart: #8010 [[Fixed #8008] Fixed DApps permission regression](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8010), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:heart: #8008 [Error "No protocol method IDeref.-deref defined for type undefined:" and crash if open DApp permissions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8008), by [annadanchenko](https://github.com/annadanchenko)
:heart: #8007 [TouchID Feature Request](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8007), by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
:heart: #8006 [Fix connection is secure test](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8006), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #8005 [[fix] fetch wallet token transactions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8005), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8003 [Block user from 1-1 chat header](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8003), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #8037 [Fix broken contact syncing](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8037), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
It received :+1: x0, :smile: x0, :tada: x3 and :heart: x0.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #8031 [add diawi upload retries](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8031), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
It received 27 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 33 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 12 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #8042 [Fixed broken EIP15777 support](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8042), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:yellow_heart: #8039 [workaround issue with building iOS release builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8039), by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:yellow_heart: #8036 [Tribute to Talk adr](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8036), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)

:yellow_heart: #8018 [Update status-go to v0.24.0-beta.1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8018), by [dshulyak](https://github.com/dshulyak)
:yellow_heart: #8004 [[Fixes #7325] Add EIP681 deeplink support](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8004), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:yellow_heart: #7978 [Handle wrong pairing password](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/7978), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:yellow_heart: #7937 [[#7911 #7894] delete account and logout after keycard reset](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/7937), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:yellow_heart: #7927 [Add support for importing keycard account to new device](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/7927), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:yellow_heart: #7616 [TtT chat flow](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/7616), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #7551 [Mobile UI for desktop](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/7551), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 21 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #8041 [upgrade urllib3: 1.24 > 1.24.2](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8041), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #8040 [upgrade fastlane: 2.117.1 > 2.121.1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8040), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #8037 [Fix broken contact syncing](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8037), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)

:purple_heart: #8025 [Maintain scroll position after fetching gap](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8025), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #8024 [fix token transactions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8024), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8023 [[Fixes #7760] Allow copy/paste in browser URL bar](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8023), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:purple_heart: #8021 [[fix] wallet on-error dispatch](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8021), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8019 [react switch warnings fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8019), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #8017 [[#8008] Error "No protocol method IDeref.-deref defined for type unde…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8017), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #8006 [Fix connection is secure test](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8006), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #8005 [[fix] fetch wallet token transactions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8005), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8003 [Block user from 1-1 chat header](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8003), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #8000 [Fix running desktop in dev mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8000), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)

:purple_heart: #7997 [Multiple messages gaps per chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/7997), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)

:purple_heart: #7910 [[refactor] send-transaction-message fx/defn](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/7910), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 21 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix] wallet on-error dispatch  the code to dispatch an event on transaction error was not working this fixes it  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c4f719352ef4f398aa4cc3b72a7aceb6da68c6f3) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [updating dev dependencies  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/fa18f3b746f1f3918b5e4b0976d39dd2f2db9fc8) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Maintain scroll postion after fetching gap  Signed-off-by: Igor Mandrigin <i@mandrigin.ru>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3a2d70273e9bd18e8674fa10dba5e567d20eaec2) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [upgrade urllib3: 1.24 > 1.24.2  Details: https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-11324  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e55cbc4c1f98b745c2af609163651d1084272d38) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [upgrade fastlane: 2.117.1 > 2.121.1  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im> Signed-off-by: Igor Mandrigin <i@mandrigin.ru>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9ff0ebce03dea44f2d5574ad4af572e6a957f53a) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix broken contact syncing  Signed-off-by: Igor Mandrigin <i@mandrigin.ru>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/494772a35da4b5c021a3c019b6c4aef73b004aa0) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[Fixes #8001] Fixes white flash on Android  Signed-off-by: Igor Mandrigin <i@mandrigin.ru>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/bdb672e1316f3174aa3b2668ba07b6064e0c8f02) by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Multiple messages gaps per chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c98f547349bc3844340c35a3be05d87855731616) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix token transactions  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/60225995b7ede8caa53087211b1237b7c4dd9593) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [ensure card has applet installed before starting setup  Signed-off-by: Dmitry Novotochinov <dmitry.novot@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/072ab5c48752c87de371ed25cc6aaeab4a9982af) by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix connection is secure test  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c49a2269c56b2ffecab85b4441d6108fb79e8082) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [remove ability to change values while signing transaction  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/701773608c390987f7304bb63ff9403f26c2e32d) by [trowacat](https://github.com/trowacat)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#8008] Error "No protocol method IDeref.-deref defined for type undefined:" and crash if open DApp permissions  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/722fd67938d48e1f38b9fd25694a707833aa4586) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [react switch warnings fix  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/0d2be794521f5ecdcdc0ee0638643aa6ceb2cfb6) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix] fetch wallet token transactions  - previously wallet transaction fetching was quite hazardous - most of the time the `:wallet/all-tokens` map was nil so no token was recognized - the query for transfers was made accross 100000 blocks, now it only checks that the first time, then from latest block checked minus 12 to follow progress of unconfirmed transactions  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3134d1dfceb5429bc11ac95a4cc87e7c2789933e) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[feature] implement erc20 get-transaction for SNT and STT  - change `ethereum/get-transaction` to use call-private-rpc instead of web3 object - implement a version for erc20 tokens SNT and STT that provides enriches result of get-transaction with `:recipient` and `:snt-amount`  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9d84ef3ad18df5cad8682e53324862f3102a1327) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[refactor] send-transaction-message fx/defn  - turn :send-transaction-message event into an fx producing function - allow transaction with defined on-result event to also send transaction message  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/2c028a474b0d7d86efd8858e1e76f7133fd6adeb) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Removed changes that lead to error when running desktop in a dev mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/d05ff8a1b86a50735aa0df74ced925d9b321c860) by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add tests for block user from public chat and 1-1 header  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e9fa601e7aff4f176f42ac04d259c60c2935acca) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#7933] fix - joining public chat with messages throws error  [#7933] fix - joining public chat with messages throws error](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8482ea5b5aa0d97b07e0ae865de473270d6a03dc) by [bitsikka](https://github.com/bitsikka)
:hammer_and_wrench: [merge nix-cache build Jenkinsfiles  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/a4b5f69e5bf7281ca689dfaa8a76e45b11f9b34c) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)

Last week there were no releases.

 - - - 

That's all for last week, please <kbd>:eyes: **Watch**</kbd> and <kbd>:star: **Star**</kbd> the repository [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:
